title: Anyone have any funny toxic stories?
body:
I'm sure we've all had one of these people at some point; Someone who's toxic AF, but their rage is so stupidly rooted that it's hilarious to watch.
Does anyone have any stories of this happening to them?

I had one where an enemy Zac was winning the game, and he was bitching at us for losing. He was almost full build, doing {{item:3078}} to us, and he was legitimately raging for destroying our towers, us ganking him 3v1, taking dragons, everything he did right, he would complain about. And no it wasn't sarcasm; He made that abundantly clear. He was REALLY pissed that he was winning.
